title: IBM Cloud VPC docs
introduction: With IBM Cloud Virtual Private Cloud (VPC), you can quickly provision virtual server instances and other Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) offerings. Leverage the docs, API & SDK reference, architecture references, and more to support your infrastructure needs.

section_recommended.title: Using the IBM Cloud console to create VPC resources
section_recommended.description: Get up and running quickly by completing this short tutorial to set up a VPC and subnet, configure an ACL, and create a virtual server instance with block storage and networking options.

section_recommended.title: Creating an instance group for auto scaling
section_recommended.description: Set up an instance group to dynamically add or remove instances according to your requirements.

section_recommended.title: About creating an image from a volume
section_recommended.description: Learn about creating a custom image from a boot volume on a virtual server instance.

tiles.title: VPC Instance Metadata service (GA)
tiles.description: The VPC Instance Metadata service is now generally available in all regions. This free service provides a REST API you invoke within an instance to get information about that instance. Access to the API is unavailable from outside the instance. The service is disabled by default. Before you can access the metadata, the service lets you generate an instance identity access token for accessing the metadata service. You can optionally get an IAM token from this token to access all IAM-enabled services. The VPC Instance Metadata service is currently supported only on x86 systems.

tiles.title: UI Update
tiles.description: There is a new Location cascading selector. For example, when you provision a virtual server, the Location section now has 3 new cascading selector boxes. You can now choose the geographic location, the metro (region) location, and the zone. The options available in these boxes are updated based on your selections. For example, if you select “Americas” for the Geography, then the Metro box displays only the Metros available for the Americas.

tiles.title: Host failure recovery policies
tiles.description: Host failure recovery policies for VPC is generally available (GA).
